column5: John Wetton, singer and bass player for such bands as King Crimson and Asia passed away yesterday at 67. His silky voice will definitely be missed. Way too many folks passing away lately...  HH
Way too many folks passing away lately...  We are just getting older
The yellow jester does not play, but gently pulls the strings, he smiles as the puppets dance in the court of the Crimson King   RIP   JW

The yellow jester does not play, but gently pulls the strings, he smiles as the puppets dance in the court of the Crimson King   RIP   JW   Wetton had did not play or write anything on that album. He did however play and co-write KC's best album, and one of my favourite records ever.

Wetton had did not play or write anything on that album. He did however play and co-write KC's best album, and one of my favourite records ever.     Just quoting King C in general    Larks tonges in Aspic, and in the Court of King C are my favorites, havnt listened to RED yet but you peaked my interest
